import react, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {Tab,Row,Col,Nav,Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' function Admin (){ const [data, setData] = useState({ title : "", name : "", posterUrl : "", }) function submit(e){ e.preventDefault(); axios.post(' http://localhost:3005/posts',data) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) }) } function handle(e){ const newdata = { ...data } newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData (newdata) console.log(newdata) } return( <>
Tab 1 Tab 2
submit(e)}> title handle(e)} value={data.title} type="text" id="title" placeholder="title" /> name handle(e)} value={data.name} type="text" id="name" placeholder="name" /> date handle(e)} value={data.date} type="text" id="date" placeholder="date" />
hamdi
) } export default Admin
